panels.description: Mede a quantidade de mensagens enviadas por segundo nas filas RabbitMQ criadas para os microsserviços de gerenciamento de contatos.

targets.expr:
sum(rate(rabbitmq_global_messages_redelivered_total[1m])) 
  by (instance, namespace, pod) 
  * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster) 
  rabbitmq_identity_info{rabbitmq_cluster="$rabbitmq_cluster", namespace="$namespace"} +
sum(rate(rabbitmq_global_messages_delivered_consume_auto_ack_total[1m])) 
  by (instance, namespace, pod) 
  * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster) 
  rabbitmq_identity_info{rabbitmq_cluster="$rabbitmq_cluster", namespace="$namespace"} +
sum(rate(rabbitmq_global_messages_delivered_consume_manual_ack_total[1m])) 
  by (instance, namespace, pod) 
  * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster) 
  rabbitmq_identity_info{rabbitmq_cluster="$rabbitmq_cluster", namespace="$namespace"} +
sum(rate(rabbitmq_global_messages_delivered_get_auto_ack_total[1m])) 
  by (instance, namespace, pod) 
  * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster) 
  rabbitmq_identity_info{rabbitmq_cluster="$rabbitmq_cluster", namespace="$namespace"} +
sum(rate(rabbitmq_global_messages_delivered_get_manual_ack_total[1m])) 
  by (instance, namespace, pod) 
  * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster) 
  rabbitmq_identity_info{rabbitmq_cluster="$rabbitmq_cluster", namespace="$namespace"}

panels.title: Mensagens enviadas por segundo
